inicio.home_descricao: My career is based on a commitment to well-being and support for those who provide assistance psychology in different contexts. It's a pleasure to have you here, get to know a little more about me

sobre.sobre_descrição_caixa:
I have a degree in Psychology, with a solid academic background and additional training in Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy (CBT) and Forensic Psychology.

I currently live abroad, where I dedicate myself to helping Brazilians who live outside their country of origin. In addition, I also provide services in host communities, working with homeless people.

atuação.atuação_texto_violencia: I have dedicated my time and effort to supporting victims of domestic violence, offering a safe space to explore their experiences, overcome trauma, and regain control over their lives.
atuação.atuação_texto_ansiedade: Anxiety and depression are common challenges around the world. I work with individuals facing these disorders, helping them understand their causes and develop strategies to reduce the impact of these conditions on their daily lives.
atuação.atuação_texto_traumas: Trauma can leave deep emotional scars. In my practice, I help my clients process past trauma and find healthy ways to move forward.
atuação.caixa_terapia_texto:
My core therapeutic approach is Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), a proven effective methodology that focuses on identifying and modifying patterns of thinking and behavior that may be causing emotional distress. Through CBT, I work collaboratively with my clients to develop practical strategies that promote mental and emotional well-being.

My goal is to provide an empathetic and supportive therapeutic environment where each person can explore their challenges and develop the skills necessary to achieve emotional and psychological well-being.

contato.contato_texto:
If you are looking for support in these areas or would like to find out more about how Cognitive Behavioral Therapy can benefit you, please don't hesitate to get in touch.

I'm here to help on your path towards a healthier and more balanced life.
